Hi TheThingy.  This link you put to virustotal shows that the file has 9 virus alerts.  I'm curious if you're saying that the user should beware if using this file, or if you're saying that those 9 hits are false positives.  I don't quite understand those back-and-forth between TPB users, virus concerns versus dumb noobs not knowing a false positive when they see one.  Bottom line is that I don't want to get one, so how do you know for sure which ones are false positives, or if they are actually the indicated virus?  Thanks!
